ModMetaData.name: Steves Walls
ModMetaData.author: Scurvyez
ModMetaData.description:
Discord: steveo.o
This mod adds several new glowing walls to the game.
~ Must be unlocked via research ~ Two types, rounded and squared ~ (Alert) variants for each, a glowing pulse emits while enemies are around ~ Walls let light through ~ Walls require power to glow ~ 3-tile wide glow radius ~ Can be flicked on and off ~ New, clear walls with the 1.4 color picker enables for colored glow ~ Legacy pre-colored walls still here as well
